parameter.name: resourceId
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the resource.

parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.description: Url of Facebook.

parameter.name: apiVersion
parameter.description: Version of Facebook API

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: The title of the video.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: The description of the video.

parameter.name: unpublishedContentType
parameter.description: Type of unpublished content, such as scheduled, draft or ads_post.

parameter.name: fileUrl
parameter.description: Accessible URL of a video file.

parameter.name: uploadPhase
parameter.description: Type of chunked upload request.

parameter.name: fileSize
parameter.description: The size of the entire video file in bytes.

parameter.name: startOffset
parameter.description: Start byte position of the file chunk.

parameter.name: uploadSessionId
parameter.description: ID of the chunked upload session.

parameter.name: contentCategory
parameter.description: Content category of this video.

parameter.name: embeddable
parameter.description: Whether the video is embeddable.

parameter.name: backdatedPost
parameter.description: Settings to allow backdated video post

parameter.name: callToAction
parameter.description: Call to action for someone viewing a video, such as Reply.

parameter.name: feedTargeting
parameter.description: Object that controls news feed targeting for this content.

parameter.name: published
parameter.description: Whether a post about this video is published.

parameter.name: scheduledPublishTime
parameter.description: Time when the page post about this video should go live

parameter.name: targeting
parameter.description: Object that limits the audience for this content

parameter.name: noStory
parameter.description: If set to true, this will suppress feed and timeline story.
